CustomField.description: Friendly text for the source of this fee
CustomField.formula:
IF( AppliesToLegacy__c == TakenFromLegacy__c || AppliesToRecommendation__c == TakenFromRecommendation__c , "This " + IF( ISBLANK(AppliesToRecommendation__c), TakenFromRecommendation__r.Product__r.Name, AppliesToRecommendation__r.Product__r.Name) ,
AppliesToRecommendation__r.PrimaryOwner__r.FirstName + IF( ISBLANK( AppliesToRecommendation__r.JointOwner__c) , " & " + AppliesToRecommendation__r.JointOwner__r.FirstName, "" ) + "'s " + IF( ISBLANK(AppliesToRecommendation__c), TakenFromRecommendation__r.Product__r.Name , AppliesToRecommendation__r.Product__r.Name ))
CustomField.label: Taken from
